roleset.name: travel in a sled, sledge or sleigh

example.name: All arguments, passive
example.text: [The big yellow Labrador]-1 had to be sledged *trace*-1 along on her bottom the entire length of the passage by the vet.
example.arg: the entire length of the passage

example.name: No theme
example.text: The children sledged all day by the lake.

roleset.note: Roleset based on internet search. Added because none existed. Member of Vncls 51.4.1. Comparison to "travel". Roleset by Julia.

roleset.name: hit with a sledgehammer

roles.note: instrument not yet seen in examples.

example.name: Classic example with predication
example.text: We sledged the door jambs back so his door would open/close.

roleset.note: Roleset based on internet search. Added because none existed. No Vncls. Comparison to "hit". Roleset by Julia.
